ol.li: Return to your characterization work directory: cd ..
Run the setup script to create the library characterization run directory, and then cd to the directory:$INTEL_LDK/training/libraries/char/setup/CreateSetup.csh i0m seq ulvt cd i0m_seq_ulvt

Execute the script run.csh to run characterization: ./run.csh
The run time for 20 jobs is about 25 minutes.

li.p:
Review the resulting .lib files in the directory ./out_dir_probe_fix_index/PV/allcells/ and then copy them to the golden DB area:mkdir -p $LDK_WORKAREA/training/setup/cadence/ldk/stdcells_1278.ldk_demo_lib/lib/seq_ulvt
cp out_dir_probe_fix_index/PV/allcells/*.lib $LDK_WORKAREA/training/setup/cadence/ldk/stdcells_1278.ldk_demo_lib/lib/seq_ulvt/
